Class FrequencyOfQueryWordsProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.java.searchengine.queryprocessors.FrequencyOfQueryWordsProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QueryProcessor

    public class FrequencyOfQueryWordsProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
implements QueryProcessor
    An implementation of QueryProcessor that sums the frequency of the query words that appear in a document

    • Method Detail

      • processQueries

        public void processQueries(java.util.List<Query> queries,
                           InvertedIndex index,
                           double threshold)
        Sums the frequency of document words that appear in a query. The results are stores in their respective Query object.
        Specified by:
        processQueries in interface QueryProcessor
        Parameters:
        index - An InvertedIndex object where information is going to be extracted to answer the queries.
        queries - A List of Query objects with the content of which query. After the query as been processed it's results are going to be store in it's respective object.
        threshold - The minimum value of the results
